UI

Class DisplayManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • UI.DisplayManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DisplayInterface

    public class DisplayManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements DisplayInterface
    Class to manage the display sequence of screen/tabs in form Screen
    Author:
    Anudeep Ghosh
